text: Now, where to begin?
Now, where to begin?
My mother named me Enola…
My mother named me Enola…
which, backwards,  spells "alone."
which, backwards,  spells "alone."
And yet,  we were always together.
And it was wonderful.
And it was wonderful.
She was my whole world.
She was my whole world.
Which leads me to the second thing you need to know.
Which leads me to the second thing you need to know.
A week ago, I awoke…
A week ago, I awoke…
A week ago, I awoke…
Mother?
…to find that my mother was missing,
…to find that my mother was missing,
and she did not return.
I'm presently on the way to collect my brothers,
I'm presently on the way to collect my brothers,
Mycroft and Sherlock.
Mycroft and Sherlock.
Yes, Sherlock Holmes,
Yes, Sherlock Holmes,
the famous detective, my genius brother.
the famous detective, my genius brother.
-He will have all the answers. -Enola.
-He will have all the answers. -Enola.
-He will have all the answers. -Enola.
-Where's your hat and gloves? -Well, I have a hat.
-Where's your hat and gloves? -Well, I have a hat.
-Where's your hat and gloves? -Well, I have a hat.
It just makes my head itch,
It just makes my head itch,
and I have no gloves.
My God.
My God.
A wild woman brought up a wild child.
A wild woman brought up a wild child.
A wild woman brought up a wild child.
We'll make her acceptable for society.
We'll make her acceptable for society.
We'll make her acceptable for society.
She seems intelligent.
She seems intelligent.
There are two paths you can take, Enola,
There are two paths you can take, Enola,
yours or the path others choose for you.
yours or the path others choose for you.
yours or the path others choose for you.
yours or the path others choose for you.
It is time to find my mother.
It is time to find my mother.
The game is afoot.
The game is afoot.
If I have to stay hidden from my brothers…
If I have to stay hidden from my brothers…
I must become something…
I must become something…
unexpected.
unexpected.
A lady.
You've progressed nicely.
You've progressed nicely.
-Is she safe? -She's had company.
-Is she safe? -She's had company.
-I'm Viscount Tewkesbury. -A useless boy.
-I'm Viscount Tewkesbury. -A useless boy.
-I'm Viscount Tewkesbury. -A useless boy.
You have to help me. I'm not ready to die on a train.
You have to help me. I'm not ready to die on a train.
You have to help me. I'm not ready to die on a train.
I'm not ready to die at all,
and I wasn't going to  before I met you!
and I wasn't going to  before I met you!
What are you planning, Mother?
What are you planning, Mother?
She always had a reason for everything…
She always had a reason for everything…
her own way of doing things.
her own way of doing things.
Perhaps she wants  to change the world.
Perhaps she wants  to change the world.
Perhaps it's a world that needs changing.
Perhaps it's a world that needs changing.
Up, come on!
Unlike most well-bred ladies,
Unlike most well-bred ladies,
I was never taught to embroider.
I was never taught to embroider.
I was taught to watch… and listen.
I was taught to watch… and listen.
I was taught to watch… and listen.
I was taught to fight.
I was taught to fight.
I'm coming to find you, Mother.
I'm coming to find you, Mother.
You don't know how to embroider?
You don't know how to embroider?
